elements.text: Or the people who were most vulnerable already died the first time around

text: infection in the first wave was significantly lower than second wave so i doubt it covered all the weakest individuals. if it is true, the spread of infection follows the small-world network where there are small super-spreaders which can infect a lot of people in its immediate neighborhood. small-world network will just need two to three hops to reach these vulnerable ones like in social networks.
